title: Experts join forces to help accelerate NHS use of artificial intelligence
description: The national commission will advise the Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency on new guidelines, expected to be published next year.
content:
Doctors, researchers and experts from tech firms will work together to accelerate the use of artificial intelligence (AI) in the NHS while maintaining patient safety, officials have announced.

title: AI Boom Will Boost US Renewables Despite Trump, Fortescue Says
description: President Donald Trump’s dismissal of climate change and attacks on renewable energy won’t significantly damp demand for clean power in the US, where artificial intelligence will further accelerate the shift to cheap, low-carbon energy, according to Fortescue Ltd.

title: Elon Musk's xAI to provide Grok chatbot to U.S. federal agencies
description: Elon Musk’s xAI has struck a deal with the U.S. General Services Administration (GSA) to provide the artificial intelligence startup’s Grok chatbot to federal agencies.
content:
Elon Musk's xAI has struck a deal with the U.S. General Services Administration (GSA) to provide the artificial intelligence startup's Grok chatbot to federal agencies, the government's procurement arm said on Thursday.

title: AI in the Classroom: Opportunities and Risks for Students with Special Education Needs
description: The OECD report argues that artificial intelligence, when ethically designed and carefully governed, can support students with special education needs by providing personalized tools for learning, communication, and accessibility. It warns, however, that without strong safeguards around privacy, bias, cost, and accountability, AI risks deepening the very inequities it seeks to solve.
content: The OECD’s latest report, produced with research contributions from the National AI Institute for Exceptional Education, the Learning Engineering Virtual Institute, and European university consortia, makes a persuasive argument that artificial intell... [6475 chars]

title: UK Seeks AI Rules to Spur Health-Care Overhaul, Protect Patients
description: The UK is pushing ahead on regulations for artificial intelligence in health care, creating a national commission to help the country attract health-tech investment and make the most of the AI revolution.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- The UK is pushing ahead on regulations for artificial intelligence in health care, creating a national commission to help the country attract health-tech investment and make the most of the AI revolution.

title: U.S. judge preliminarily approves $1.5 billion Anthropic copyright settlement
description: A federal judge in California on Thursday preliminarily approved a landmark $1.5 billion settlement of a copyright class action brought by a group of authors against artificial intelligence company Anthropic.
